member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.StartupTask
member.summary: Represents a UWP app or a desktop application background task that runs at system startup or when the user logs in to their device.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.StartupTask.State
member.summary: Gets the state (enabled, disabled, or disabled by user) of the startup task.
member.returns: The state of the startup task.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.StartupTask.TaskId
member.summary: Gets the Id of the startup task.
member.returns: The Id of the startup task.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.StartupTask.GetAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a startup task by Id.
member.param: The Id of the startup task to get.
member.returns: When this method completes, it returns the startup task with the given Id.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.StartupTask.GetForCurrentPackageAsync
member.summary: Gets all startup tasks for the current app package.
member.returns: When this method completes, it returns all startup tasks for the current app package.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.StartupTask.RequestEnableAsync
member.summary: Requests that the startup task be enabled. If the task was disabled by the user using Task Manager, this method will not override their choice and the user must re-enable the task manually.
member.returns: When this method completes, it returns the state of the startup task.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.StartupTaskState
member.summary: Represents the state (enabled, disabled, or disabled by user) of a startup task.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.StartupTaskState.DisabledByPolicy
member.summary: The task is disabled by the administrator or group policy. Platforms that don't support startup tasks also report **DisabledByPolicy**.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.StartupTaskState.DisabledByUser
member.summary: The task was disabled by the user. It can only be re-enabled by the user.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.StartupTaskState.EnabledByPolicy
member.summary: The task is enabled by the administrator or group policy.
